name: Agustina Cordoba
coverLetter: Experience with plants for many years growing them. Im with my boyfriend travelling and we would like to find a place to stay from months to a few years so we look for acomodations like a shower, toilet and maybe a little room for us would be great. If not possible the room we have our tent to put somewhere.We are really hard workers and respectful people. Just give us the chance to show what we can do :). We are looking for full time job for all the season and coming years. We both do labor and trimming.
